text: قَالَ يَـٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ

translation.en.sahih: [Allah] said, O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate?"
translation.id.indonesian: Allah berfirman: "Hai iblis, apa sebabnya kamu tidak (ikut sujud) bersama-sama mereka yang sujud itu?"
